title: Trade in Services Powerhouse
description: In 2023, Luxembourg's trade in services accounted for 315.32% of its GDP, highlighting its significant role in the global services market.

title: Top Government Effectiveness
description: Luxembourg achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Government Effectiveness percentile rank in 2023, indicating exceptional governance.

title: High Regulatory Quality
description: In 2023, Luxembourg scored 100 in the Regulatory Quality percentile rank, showcasing its strong regulatory environment.

title: Leading in GDP per Capita
description: Luxembourg's GDP per capita was $130,491.30 in 2023, one of the highest in the world, reflecting its economic prosperity.

title: Minimal Fish Species Threat
description: As of 2018, Luxembourg had only 1 threatened fish species, indicating a relatively healthy aquatic environment.

title: Low Total Reserves
description: In 2023, Luxembourg's total reserves were only 0.07 months of imports, indicating a potential vulnerability in foreign exchange reserves.
